RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStatsTotalRound.summary: The totalRoundTripTime property of the dictionary indicates the cumulative number sum of all round trip time (RTT) measurements since the beginning of the session, in seconds.

remarks.para:
The individual round trip time is calculated based on the RTCP timestamps in the RTCP Receiver Report (RR), hence requires a DLSR value other than 0.
The average RTT can be computed by dividing totalRoundTripTime by .

RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStatsTotalRound.value: A number indicating the total round trip time for the session, in seconds.
